entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Cambridge
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:44 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 0.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Region of Waterloo Int'l Airport 12:00 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 0.8°C
Pressure: 102.0 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 66 %
Dewpoint: -4.9°C
Wind: NNE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High 7.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. High 7. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Showers. High 6.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to a few rain showers in the morning. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southeast 50 gusting to 80 in the afternoon. High 6. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
